amendment.description: An amendment numbered 66 printed in House Report 118-142 to prevent the DOD from purchasing data that would otherwise require a warrant, court order, or subpoena.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Davidson amendment (A041) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A041) offered by Mr. Davidson.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Davidson amendment (A041) Agreed to by voice vote.
